items.sentence: We need to know everything there is to know about Tom.
Tom was on his way to the library when I ran into him.
Tom knew Mary wasn't likely to tell him what happened.
Tom thought Mary was the one who was going to do that.
Tom will have to ask Mary to do that for us, won't he?
The only flavor of ice cream that Tom eats is vanilla.
Tom is short, but he's still a good basketball player.
Are you telling me that you don't know how to do this?
Line a baking dish with thin slices of buttered bread.
There's a good chance that Tom won't get here on time.
